ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and whose way I have smoothed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And made things easy for them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and for whom I have smoothed the way (to power and riches),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: whose life I have made run smoothly
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And made several preparations for him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And made life smooth and comfortable for him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And I adjusted affairs for him adjustably;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and made all things smooth for him;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and whom I have provided with every resource,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And for whom I smoothed everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: To whom I made (life) smooth and comfortable!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And made life smooth and comfortable for him!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: I made things smooth and easy for him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And spread [everything] before him, easing [his life].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [74:14] and facilitated, extended, for him greatly, [his] livelihood, duration of life and children.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And made (life) smooth for him) he had his wealth piled up just as one piles up couches on top of each other.
